Function reference

All functions

custom_entropy()
Calculate a modified entropy formula.
cv2sdlog()
Converting the coefficient of variation in the original scale to the standard deviation of the log-normal.
generate_provenance_string()
This function returns a string that can be added to trace the provenance of a table.
prec_paireddiff()
Quick table for sample size estimation for change-from baseline
presize_log_backtransform()
Return a presize object with intervals back-transformed
qplot_obs_long()
Plot observed trajectories of longitudinal data
qtab_glm_nb()
Function to provide quick flextable to estimate differences in response rate from a negative binomial model with offset
qtab_lm_anova()
Function to provide a quick table for ANCOVA analyses with linear models
qtabl_mglm_coef()
Table for generating a table combining multiple glm calls
rand_adlb
Randomly generated ADLB data from the random.cdisc.data R package
rand_adsl
Randomly generated ADSL data from the random.cdisc.data R package
toxicity_by_grade()
Obtain the rates of toxicity events by grade.

Developed by Quang Nguyen.
